reference.title: apiRef
reference.shortdesc: The <apiRef> element is the top-level element for generic API reference topic type.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <apiRef> element provides the common structure and elements for generic API reference topic types. This element requires an ID attribute as an anchor point. This ID is the target for references by <link> or <xref> elements (conref attribute), and for other internal specialization elements that refer to this <apiRef> content. Use a unique key such as fully qualified package name for the named API reference.
